evidence.claim: The National Foundation for Transplants mentions compliance with HIPAA regulations on its website.
The organization is involved in handling health information related to transplants, which implies the use of standards like FHIR and HL7.
They have a focus on healthcare services related to transplants, indicating familiarity with EHR systems and clearinghouses.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence of X12 transaction use cases on the site.
